title: Iron curtain point of view audience

content.question: The fact that a former British prime minister expressed the ideas in the excerpt to an audience in the United States helped promote which of the following?

choices.label: United States support for British efforts to retain its colonial empire
A greater United States willingness to share nuclear weapons with Britain
A decision by the United States to withdraw troops from Japan in order to better protect Europe
The participation of both Britain and the United States in an international collective security system

content.answer: The participation of both Britain and the United States in an international collective security system
